full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA RGYANG 'BOD BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA DANG SBYAR BA THAR 'DOD NYE LAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,CES RANG GI RTZA BA'I BLA MA GANG MOS LA SBYAR CHOG PA'I BLA MA RGYANG 'BOD BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA DANG SBYAR BA THAR 'DOD NYE LAM ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DPYOD LDAN 'GA' ZHIG GI NGOR, CHOS BRGYAD KYI KHOL BO GYI NA BA ZHIG GIS BRIS PA'O, ,'DI LA NONGS PA GANG MA CHIS BLA MA DKON MCHOG DANG, GZUR GNAS MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS SPYAN SNGAR @009B 'CHAGS SO, ,DGE BAS BDAG SOGS MKHA' MNYAM SEMS CAN THAMS CAD MTSAN LDAN BSHES GNYEN DAM PAS MNYES BZHIN DU RJES SU BZUNG STE, ,BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA LA NYAMS LEN SNYING POR BYAS TE, RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,
